comment.text: The translation key "AllTypesSupportedByEditor" is used to display a label that indicates all types supported by {{organizationName}} editors. This label appears in a file selector dialog and is intended to provide clarity to users about the editor's capabilities.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'جميع الأنواع مدعومة من قبل محرري {{organizationName}}.' is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Arabic. A more natural phrasing would emphasize that the editors *support* all types.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أنواع مدعومة بالكامل من قبل محرري {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the placement of 'من قبل' (by) is slightly less common and can be improved for a more fluid reading. It's more common to omit it or restructure the sentence.

The translation "Всички видове, поддържани от редакторите на {{organizationName}}" is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Bulgarian. It would be more natural to say something like "Всички типове, които се поддържат от редакторите на {{organizationName}}" or "Всички типове, поддържани от редакторите на {{organizationName}}".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Всички типове, които се поддържат от редакторите на {{organizationName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Všechny typy podporované editory {{organizationName}}' is a literal translation but doesn't quite convey the intended meaning in a natural Czech way. It sounds somewhat awkward. The word 'editory' is fine, but the whole phrase could be improved.
The translation 'Kaikki {{organizationName}}:n editorien tukemat tyypit ' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Finnish. It's clunky and emphasizes 'supported by' unnecessarily.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like '{{organizationName}}:n editorien tukemat tyypit kaikki' or 'Kaikki tyypit, joita {{organizationName}}:n editorit tukevat'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after '{{organizationName}}' in the Finnish translation creates an awkward reading experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon. Consider restructuring the sentence to avoid it altogether, as suggested in the incorrect translation note.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation 'Բոլոր տեսակներն աջակցվում են {{organizationName}} խմբագիրների կողմից' literally translates to 'All types are supported by the editors of {{organizationName}}'. While not entirely wrong, it's less natural. A more accurate and natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'All types are supported by {{organizationName}} editors'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Բոլոր տեսակները աջակցվում են {{organizationName}} խմբագիրների կողմից կամ Բոլոր տեսակները աջակցվում են {{organizationName}} խմբագիրներից

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Visi {{organizationName}} redaktoru atbalstītie veidi" doesn't fully capture the meaning of "All types supported by {{organizationName}} editors." A more accurate translation would convey the idea of types *that the editors support*. The current translation implies the types are supported *by* the editors, but the original phrase is intended to mean that the editors can handle all types.

The translation "Toate tipuri sunt acceptate de editori {{organizationName}}" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "All types supported by {{organizationName}} editors".  A better translation would convey that the editors support all types.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Toate tipurile sunt suportate de editorii {{organizationName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, 'sunt acceptate' sounds less idiomatic than 'sunt suportate' in this context.

The translation '{{organizationName}} සංස්කාරකවරුන් විසින් සහාය දක්වන සියලුම වර්ග' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'All types supported by {{organizationName}} editors'. The phrase 'සහාය දක්වන' (sahaya dākavan) translates to 'support', while the English implies 'supported' as in, the editors can handle those types. A more accurate translation would emphasize the 'supported' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{organizationName}} සංස්කාරකවරුන් භාවිතා කරන සියලුම වර්ග ({{organizationName}} sanskārakvarun vadata veda siyālum vaga)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'podržani od strane' is a more verbose and less natural way to say 'supported by' in Serbian. A more concise and common translation would be 'подржани од' or even just 'подржани'.

The translation 'Tất cả các loại được hỗ trợ bởi trình chỉnh sửa {{organizationName}} ' is a literal translation and lacks natural flow in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would be 'Tất cả các kiểu dữ liệu được hỗ trợ bởi trình chỉnh sửa {{organizationName}}' or 'Các kiểu dữ liệu được hỗ trợ bởi trình chỉnh sửa {{organizationName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Các kiểu dữ liệu được hỗ trợ bởi trình chỉnh sửa {{organizationName}}
